'''Severn Software''' was the company that produced and developed the video game ''[[Moria (computer game)|Moria]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=Fredrik Ekman|articleurl=http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/moria.html|articlename=Moria|dated=|website=Games|accessed=16 august 2010}}</ref> Severn Software is located in a small town near the English river [[wikipedia:Severn|Severn]].<ref>{{webcite|author=Severn Software|articleurl=http://www.severnsoftware.co.uk/eu/about.php|articlename=About Us|dated=|website=[http://www.severnsoftware.co.uk/eu Severn Software]|accessed=27 july 2011}}</ref>
